On [[27 September]] [[1936]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Aurelius Pompen''' (Professor of English at the [[Wikipedia:Radboud University Nijmegen|Catholic University of Nijmegen]]).<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Pieter Collier]]|articleurl=http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/dmiller/CLP0088.htm|articlename=#CLP0088 - J.R.R Tolkien autograph letter signed J.R.R. Tolkien to Rev. Professor Dr. A. Pompen|dated=|website=TL|accessed=19 March 2012}}</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Personal life.
*'''Publication:''' None.
*'''Description:''' Handwritten letter signed by J.R.R. Tolkien, 20 Northmoor Road, Oxford.
